messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Hmmm..... "living lightly"
messages.msgSnippet: ** After having expressed the idea that Unschooling Lightly might be a possible name for the kind of unschooling discussed here sometimes...* Howsabout
messages.messageBody:
** After having expressed the idea that "Unschooling Lightly" might be a
possible "name" for the kind of unschooling discussed here sometimes...*

Howsabout "Free Rein Unschooling"?

(Or is that gonna make the other guys "bridle"?) <g>

Betsy

PS And if you say it too fast, it sounds like "Free Range Unschooling",
and the food metaphor is kind of disturbing.

messages.subject: Hmmm..... "living lightly"
messages.msgSnippet: After having expressed the idea that Unschooling Lightly might be a possible name for the kind of unschooling discussed here sometimes, I came upon this on
messages.messageBody:
After having expressed the idea that "Unschooling Lightly" might be a
possible "name" for the kind of unschooling discussed here sometimes, I came upon
this on my own website, at the bottom of an article called "Playing"
(http://sandradodd.com/playing):


Other articles on living lightly with children:
Leaning on a Truck
Rejecting a Pre-Packaged Life
Jubilation and Triangulation
Knowing Everything

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
